timeline.bodyText: This should be left as {prodname} rather than using debezium explicitly.
timeline.author: Naros
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,14 +30,14 @@ The connector is tolerant of failures. As the connector reads commit logs and pr
 
 [NOTE]
 ====
-Cassandra is different from the other {prodname} connectors since it is not implemented on top of the Kafka Connect framework. Instead it is a single JVM process that is intended to reside on each Cassandra node and publishes events to Kafka via a Kafka producer.
+Cassandra is different from the other debezium connectors since it is not implemented on top of the Kafka Connect framework. Instead it is a single JVM process that is intended to reside on each Cassandra node and publishes events to Kafka via a Kafka producer.
